titles.title: A bill to specify the burden of proof in certain Federal civil suits relating to conditions in State penal facilities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

bill.summary: 2/3/1988--Introduced. States that the burden of proof in Federal civil suits regarding overcrowding in State penal facilities in violation of the eighth amendment shall be by clear and convincing evidence.
